team_experience: Our technical team has years of experience in engineering areas.
mission_description: To be a reference in the national and international market, focusing primarily and sustainably in the long term, through competent and motivated employees, ensuring the full satisfaction of the needs of demanding clients.
vision_description: To assume the commitment to ethics and transparency in the provision of our services and employed products, ensuring the quality and satisfaction of our clients, always seeking continuous improvement in the process.
project_description: Development and planning of mechanical and boiler projects, structural dimensioning and calculation.
maintenance_description: Maintenance of industrial machines, metal structures, boiler projects, hydraulic and pneumatic equipment.
manufacturing_description: Metal constructions, mechanical parts and assemblies.
